ingredients: spaghetti, ground beef, onion, carrot, garlic, tomato paste, canned tomatoes, ketchup, dark soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, sugar, chicken stock, bay leaves, mozzarella cheese
description: A fusion dish featuring spaghetti topped with a sweet-savory meat sauce, then baked with melted cheese on top

ingredients: beef, cabbage, potatoes, carrots, tomatoes, celery, onion, garlic, tomato paste, chicken broth
description: A Hong Kong adaptation of the Eastern European soup, made without beets and featuring a tomato-based broth with tender beef and vegetables.

ingredients: egg noodles, chicken, assorted vegetables, soy sauce, oyster sauce, cornstarch, garlic
description: Crispy pan-fried noodles topped with a savory stir-fry of meat and vegetables in a flavorful sauce.

ingredients: cooked rice, chicken, shrimp, mushrooms, eggs, garlic, soy sauce, oyster sauce, green onions
description: A two-part dish with fried rice topped with a saucy stir-fry of meats and vegetables.

ingredients: chinese broccoli (gai lan), garlic, oil, salt, oyster sauce
description: A simple and healthy dish of crisp-tender Chinese broccoli stir-fried with garlic and seasoned with oyster sauce.

ingredients: pork chops, rice, tomato sauce, onion, bell pepper, cheese, garlic
description: Breaded pork chops served over rice, smothered in a tangy tomato sauce, and baked with cheese until golden.

englishname: steamed pork patty with preserved vegetables
ingredients: ground pork, preserved vegetables (dong cai), soy sauce, sesame oil, white pepper, cornstarch, green onions
description: A comforting steamed dish combining seasoned ground pork with savory preserved vegetables.

ingredients: chicken, coconut milk, curry powder, onion, bell pepper, potatoes, cheese, rice
description: A Macau-inspired dish featuring chicken in a creamy coconut curry sauce, baked over rice with melted cheese.
Steamed plain white rice, a staple accompaniment to many Chinese dishes.

ingredients: pork belly, five-spice powder, salt, vinegar
description: Crispy-skinned roast pork belly seasoned with aromatic spices, a popular Cantonese delicacy.

englishname: sizzling steak in black pepper sauce
ingredients: steak, black pepper, onion, bell pepper, soy sauce, oyster sauce, garlic
description: Tender steak served on a hot plate, smothered in a rich black pepper sauce with vegetables.

ingredients: whole chicken, ginger, green onions, salt, oil
description: Gently poached chicken served with a fragrant ginger-scallion oil, highlighting the natural flavors of the meat.
